Date: Monday, 5/1/1992
Subject: Status of Mike Erb
Dear Sir,
Mike Erb seems overmatched at AA Wichita Wranglers!
He has an ERA of 10.41 over there, so I think
you should demote him.

Regards,
Scouting Director



Date: Monday, 5/1/1992
Subject: Status of Alex Arias
Dear Sir,
Alex Arias isn't hitting the ball at all at AA Wichita Wranglers!
He has an AVG of .214, so a demotion is
the right choice. He shouldn't be emberassed any more.

Regards,
Scouting Director



Date: Monday, 5/1/1992
Subject: Status of Ivan Cruz
Dear Sir,
Ivan Cruz isn't hitting the ball at all at AA Wichita Wranglers!
He has an AVG of .196, so a demotion is
the right choice. He shouldn't be emberassed any more.

Regards,
Scouting Director

Date: Wednesday, 5/10/1992
Subject: Status of Doug Creek
Dear Sir,
Doug Creek seems overmatched at AA Wichita Wranglers!
He has an ERA of 5.56 over there, so I think
you should demote him.

Regards,
Scouting Director
